Service Details: - Provides program where volunteers and their dogs go to senior homes, extended health care facilities and the Alzheimer’s Society to visit seniors who can benefit from the unconditional love of dogs- Also provides visits at schools, and Okanagan Regional Libraries for our TAILS Program (Therapy Animals Involved in Literacy Success)
